cause.description:
This cause aims to eradicate the use of sweatshops and child labor in all industries. However, the main focus of this cause is on the apparel industry. Sweatshops and child labor run rampant in the apparel industry worldwide. Also, discrimination against labor organizers is common practice. This cause aims to end these practices.
1. Sweatshops are not beneficial to society
2. Children should go to school, not work
3. All workers should be represented by a fair, democratic union
cause.mission: End the use of sweatshops and child labor in all industries
cause.name: End Sweatshops!
